content.text: [@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) I understand that, my point is that humans are lazy and it seems like the sort of thing that would be easy to do automatically, especially for less-technical users (similar to how we strip EXIF metadata by default). I'd *personally* rather not have to manually optimize all of my media before upload, but I'm lazy as hell.
